C3: Produce a report of the group elements in the vector.
Export the group elements to GAP and generate the group.
Transform the given variety by the group elements in the vector.
Create a new vector from the elements given in the index set. The index set must be a label of a vector of integers. Indexing of elements of the vector is zero-based.
Perform field reduction w.r.t. the subfield of the given index s. The group must be a matrix group over a field admitting a subfield of index s.
